LanguageData.AEXP_EggAnacondaFertilized.label: anaconda egg (fert.)
LanguageData.AEXP_EggAnacondaFertilized.description: A fertilized anaconda egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into an anaconda. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
LanguageData.AEXP_EggAlligatorFertilized.label: alligator egg (fert.)
LanguageData.AEXP_EggAlligatorFertilized.description: A fertilized alligator egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into an alligator. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
